Marketing site and documentation for Barazo at barazo.forum.

## What This Repo Does

- Public-facing marketing pages (homepage, features, pricing)
- User and admin documentation (MDX)
- Blog

## Website-Specific Standards

- Strict TypeScript -- `strict: true`, no `any`, no `@ts-ignore`
- Accessibility -- WCAG 2.2 AA, semantic HTML
- SEO -- meta tags, OpenGraph, sitemaps, canonical URLs
